thread.title: U.K. Finance Industry Pushes for Immigration Overhaul After Brexit

author: Philip Georgiadis
title: U.K. Finance Industry Pushes for Immigration Overhaul After Brexit
text:
The U.K. finance industry has called for wide-ranging reforms of the British immigration system to maintain the pipeline of global talent into the sector, in one of the City of Londonâ€™s biggest interventions into the Brexit debate so far.
A joint report released Monday by influential trade body TheCityUK and accounting firm EY said there...
